full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 FOR DEPARTMENT USE ONLY: IND. CODE 88 OCC. TITLE Maid - General 306.878 OCC. CODE 21. NAME OF JOB OFFERED 22. NUMBER OPENINGS TO BE 23. DAILY WORK SCHEDULE (HOURS) FILLED Live-in Cook-Housekeeper one 9 24. TOTAL HOURS PER WEEK 25. RATE OF PAY 26. IF THE JOB IS UNIONIZED, GIVE NAME AND NUMBER OF LOCAL 50 $200 per month plus room and board N/A 27. OCCUPATIONAL TITLE OF PERSON WHO WILL BE ALIEN'S 28. TYPE AND DEGREE OF SUPERVISION 29. NUMBER OF OTHER EM- IMMEDIATE SUPERVISOR ALIEN WILL RECEIVE PLOYEES ALIEN WILL Housewife Minimum SUPERVISE none 30. DESCRIBE FULLY THE JOB TO BE PERFORMED, INCLUDING DUTIES, WORKING CONDITIONS, AND EQUIPMENT OPERATED. General housework; cleaning, washing , ironing, cooking and child care 31. STATE IN DETAIL THE EDUCATION AND TRAINING REQUIRED FOR PROFICIENCY IN JOB. (Specify degrees and major fields of study re- quired. Specify apprenticeship. trade school or other training required). Minimum education only is required. One year's experience is sufficient. 32. STATE MINIMUM EXPERIENCE REQUIREMENTS OF JOB. INDICATE ACCEPTABLE EXPERIENCE IN RELATED JOBS. As question 31 above 33. DESCRIBE SKILLS, KNOWLEDGES AND ABILITIES REQUIRED FOR PROFICIENCY IN JOB. As question 31 above 34. SPECIFY ANY OTHER SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS SUCH AS LANGUAGES, LICENSES, PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS. General good health; ability to pass physical examination. Ability to undesstand and interpret instructions from English speaking employer. 35. DECLARATION OF EMPLOYER: I certify that I have examined the contents of this form and the statements are true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. SIGNATURE TITLE Husband Severe penalties are provided by law for knowingly and willfully falsifying or concealing a material fact or using any false document in the submission of this Job Offer For Alien Employment. (U.S. Codes, Title 18, Sec. 1001) 28 March Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before me this of A.D. 19 67 OFFICIAL (SEAL) at 826 Newport Blvd. N ewport Beach, Calif.
